00074 /** ============================================================================
00075  *  @name   DM6467GEM_HalObj
00076  *
00077  *  @brief  Hardware Abstraction object.
00078  *
00079  *  @param  interface
00080  *              Pointer to HAL interface table.
00081  *  @param  baseCfgBus
00082  *              base address of the configuration bus peripherals memory range.
00083  *  @param  offsetSysModule
00084  *              Offset of the system module from CFG base.
00085  *  ============================================================================
00086  */

00089     Uint32          baseCfgBus      ;
00090     Uint32          offsetSysModule ;
00091 } DM6467GEM_HalObj ;
